# UIBarMetrics.default

**Case**

Specifies default metrics for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **UIBarMetrics.compact**: Specifies metrics when using the phone idiom.
- **UIBarMetrics.defaultPrompt**: Specifies default metrics for the device for bars with the prompt property, such as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar].
- **UIBarMetrics.compactPrompt**: Specifies metrics for bars with the prompt property when using the phone idiom, such as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar].
- **landscapePhone**: Specifies metrics for landscape orientation using the phone idiom.
- **landscapePhonePrompt**: Specifies metrics for landscape orientation using the phone idiom for bars with the prompt property, such as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar].
